title.raw: 《呂不韋列傳》 Biography of Master Lü Buwei

sentences.zh: 呂不韋者，陽翟大賈人也。

translations.literal: Lü Buwei was Yangdi great merchant.
translations.idiomatic: Lü Buwei was a great merchant from Yangdi.

sentences.zh: 往來販賤賣貴，家累千金。

translations.literal: Travel buy cheap sell expensive, family accumulate thousand gold.
translations.idiomatic: He traveled buying cheap and selling dear, accumulating thousands in gold for his family.

translations.literal: Lü Buwei was a great merchant from Yangdi. He traveled trading, buying cheap selling dear, household accumulated thousand jin gold.

sentences.zh: 秦昭王四十年，太子死。

translations.literal: Qin Zhao Wang fortieth year, crown prince die.
translations.idiomatic: In King Zhao of Qin's fortieth year, the crown prince died.

sentences.zh: 其四十二年，以其次子安國君為太子。

translations.literal: His forty second year, with his second son Anguo Jun as crown prince.
translations.idiomatic: In his forty-second year, he made his second son, Lord Anguo, the crown prince.

sentences.zh: 安國君有子二十餘人。

translations.literal: Anguo Jun have sons twenty plus people.
translations.idiomatic: Lord Anguo had over twenty sons.

sentences.zh: 安國君有所甚愛姬，立以為正夫人，號曰華陽夫人。

translations.literal: Anguo Jun have what greatly love concubine, establish as primary wife, titled Huayang Furen.
translations.idiomatic: Lord Anguo had a greatly loved concubine whom he established as his primary wife, titled Lady Huayang.

sentences.zh: 華陽夫人無子。

translations.literal: Huayang Furen no sons.
translations.idiomatic: Lady Huayang had no sons.

sentences.zh: 安國君中男名子楚，子楚母曰夏姬，毋愛。

translations.literal: Anguo Jun middle son named Zichu, Zichu mother called Xia Ji, not loved.
translations.idiomatic: Lord Anguo's middle son was named Zichu. Zichu's mother was called Xia Ji and was not loved.

sentences.zh: 子楚為秦質子於趙。

translations.literal: Zichu was Qin hostage son in Zhao.
translations.idiomatic: Zichu was Qin's hostage in Zhao.

sentences.zh: 秦數攻趙，趙不甚禮子楚。

translations.literal: Qin frequently attack Zhao, Zhao not greatly respect Zichu.
translations.idiomatic: Qin frequently attacked Zhao, and Zhao did not greatly respect Zichu.

translations.literal: Qin King Zhao fortieth year, crown prince died. His forty-second year, made his second son Anguo Jun crown prince. Anguo Jun had sons twenty plus persons. Anguo Jun had a much loved concubine, established as proper wife, titled Huayang Madame. Huayang Madame had no sons. Anguo Jun middle son named Zichu, Zichu mother called Xia Ji, not favored. Zichu served as Qin hostage in Zhao. Qin repeatedly attacked Zhao, Zhao not much honored Zichu.

sentences.zh: 子楚，秦諸庶孽孫，質於諸侯，車乘進用不饒，居處困，不得意。

translations.literal: Zichu, Qin various concubine illegitimate grandson, hostage among lords, carriages retinue supplies not plentiful, dwelling poor, not content.
translations.idiomatic: Zichu was a grandson from various Qin concubines and illegitimate lines, a hostage among the lords. His carriages, retinue, and supplies were not plentiful; his dwelling was poor and he was discontent.

sentences.zh: 呂不韋賈邯鄲，見而憐之，曰「此奇貨可居」。

translations.literal: Lü Buwei trade Handan, see and pity him, said 'this strange goods can be stored'.
translations.idiomatic: Lü Buwei was trading in Handan. He saw Zichu and pitied him, saying, 'This is extraordinary merchandise that can be stored.'

sentences.zh: 乃往見子楚，說曰：「吾能大子之門。」

translations.literal: Then went see Zichu, persuade said: 'I can enlarge your gate.'
translations.idiomatic: He then went to see Zichu and said persuasively: 'I can enlarge your gate.'

sentences.zh: 子楚笑曰：「且自大君之門，而乃大吾門！」

translations.literal: Zichu laugh said: 'First enlarge your lord's gate, then enlarge my gate!'
translations.idiomatic: Zichu laughed and said: 'First enlarge your lord's gate, then enlarge my gate!'

sentences.zh: 呂不韋曰：「子不知也，吾門待子門而大。」

translations.literal: Lü Buwei said: 'You not know, my gate awaits your gate to enlarge.'
translations.idiomatic: Lü Buwei said: 'You do not understand. My gate awaits your gate to be enlarged.'

sentences.zh: 子楚心知所謂，乃引與坐，深語。

translations.literal: Zichu heart knew what meant, then invited him sit, deeply spoke.
translations.idiomatic: Zichu understood what he meant in his heart. He then invited Lü Buwei to sit and spoke deeply with him.

sentences.zh: 呂不韋曰：「秦王老矣，安國君得為太子。

translations.literal: Lü Buwei said: 'Qin king old, Anguo Jun can become crown prince.'
translations.idiomatic: Lü Buwei said: 'The King of Qin is old. Lord Anguo can become crown prince.'

sentences.zh: 竊聞安國君愛幸華陽夫人，華陽夫人無子，能立適嗣者獨華陽夫人耳。

translations.literal: Secretly heard Anguo Jun love favor Huayang Furen, Huayang Furen no sons, able establish proper heir only Huayang Furen.
translations.idiomatic: I have secretly heard that Lord Anguo loves and favors Lady Huayang. Lady Huayang has no sons. The one able to establish the proper heir is solely Lady Huayang.

sentences.zh: 今子兄弟二十餘人，子又居中，不甚見幸，久質諸侯。

translations.literal: Now you brothers twenty plus people, you again middle position, not greatly favored, long hostage lords.
translations.idiomatic: Now you have over twenty brothers. You are in the middle position and not greatly favored, having been a hostage among the lords for a long time.

sentences.zh: 即大王薨，安國君立為王，則子毋幾得與長子及諸子旦暮在前者爭為太子矣。」

translations.literal: If great king die, Anguo Jun establish king, then you mother few can with eldest son and various sons morning evening in front contend for crown prince.'
translations.idiomatic: If the great king dies and Lord Anguo becomes king, then your mother will have little chance to contend with the eldest son and the various sons who are constantly before him for the position of crown prince.'

sentences.zh: 子楚曰：「然。

translations.literal: Zichu said: 'Yes.'
translations.idiomatic: Zichu said: 'Yes.'

sentences.zh: 為之柰何？」

translations.literal: Do what?
translations.idiomatic: What should be done?'

sentences.zh: 呂不韋曰：「子貧，客於此，非有以奉獻於親及結賓客也。

translations.literal: Lü Buwei said: 'You poor, guest here, not have to offer relatives and tie guests.'
translations.idiomatic: Lü Buwei said: 'You are poor and a guest here. You have nothing to offer your relatives or to tie up guests.'

sentences.zh: 不韋雖貧，請以千金為子西游，事安國君及華陽夫人，立子為適嗣。」

translations.literal: Buwei though poor, please with thousand gold for you west travel, serve Anguo Jun and Huayang Furen, establish you as proper heir.'
translations.idiomatic: Though I am poor, please allow me to use a thousand pieces of gold for you to travel west, serve Lord Anguo and Lady Huayang, and establish you as the proper heir.'

sentences.zh: 子楚乃頓首曰：「必如君策，請得分秦國與君共之。」

translations.literal: Zichu then kowtow said: 'Must like your plan, please share Qin country with you.'
translations.idiomatic: Zichu then kowtowed and said: 'If it must be according to your plan, please allow me to share the state of Qin with you.'

translations.literal: Zichu was Qin various concubine descendants, hostage among feudal lords, chariot riding expenses not plentiful, dwelling poor, not pleased. Lü Buwei traded Handan, saw and pitied him, said 'This rare goods can store.' Thus went saw Zichu, persuaded saying: 'I can enlarge your gate.' Zichu laughed saying: 'First enlarge your lord's gate, then enlarge my gate!' Lü Buwei said: 'You do not know. My gate waits for your gate to enlarge.' Zichu heart knew meaning, thus led him sit, deeply spoke. Lü Buwei said: 'Qin king aged, Anguo Jun can become crown prince. I secretly heard Anguo Jun loves favors Huayang Madame, Huayang Madame has no sons, can establish proper heir is only Huayang Madame. Now your brothers twenty plus persons, you again middle position, not much favored, long hostage among lords. If great king dies, Anguo Jun establishes as king, then you few chance to contend with eldest son and various sons day night before as crown prince.' Zichu said: 'Yes. Handle how?' Lü Buwei said: 'You poor, guest here, no means to present to parents and tie guests. Buwei though poor, request with thousand jin gold for you west travel, serve Anguo Jun and Huayang Madame, establish you as proper heir.' Zichu thus bowed head: 'Must like your plan, please divide Qin state share with you.'

sentences.zh: 呂不韋乃以五百金與子楚，為進用，結賓客；

translations.literal: Lü Buwei then with five hundred gold give Zichu, for expenses, tie guests;
translations.idiomatic: Lü Buwei then gave Zichu five hundred pieces of gold for expenses and to tie up guests;

sentences.zh: 而復以五百金買奇物玩好，自奉而西游秦，求見華陽夫人姊，而皆以其物獻華陽夫人。

translations.literal: And again with five hundred gold buy strange objects curios, self present west travel Qin, seek see Huayang Furen sister, and all with those objects offer Huayang Furen.
translations.idiomatic: and again used five hundred pieces of gold to buy strange objects and curios. He presented himself and traveled west to Qin, sought to see Lady Huayang's sister, and offered all those objects to Lady Huayang.

sentences.zh: 因言子楚賢智，結諸侯賓客遍天下，常曰「楚也以夫人為天，日夜泣思太子及夫人」。

translations.literal: Because speak Zichu worthy wise, tie various lords guests all world, often said 'Chu also take Furen as heaven, day night weep think crown prince and Furen'.
translations.idiomatic: He spoke of Zichu as worthy and wise, having tied up guests from the various lords all over the world. He often said, 'Chu also takes the lady as heaven, weeping day and night thinking of the crown prince and the lady.'

sentences.zh: 夫人大喜。

translations.literal: Furen greatly happy.
translations.idiomatic: The lady was greatly pleased.

sentences.zh: 不韋因使其姊說夫人曰：「吾聞之，以色事人者，色衰而愛弛。

translations.literal: Buwei because make his sister persuade Furen said: 'I heard, with beauty serve people, beauty decline love relax.'
translations.idiomatic: Buwei then had his sister persuade the lady, saying: 'I have heard that those who serve people with beauty, when beauty declines, love slackens.'

sentences.zh: 今夫人事太子，甚愛而無子，不以此時蚤自結於諸子中賢孝者，舉立以為適而子之，夫在則重尊，夫百歲之後，所子者為王，終不失勢，此所謂一言而萬世之利也。

translations.literal: Now Furen serve crown prince, greatly loved but no sons, not with this time early self attach to various sons middle worthy filial, raise establish as proper and make son, husband in then heavy honored, husband hundred years after, that son become king, end not lose power, this called one word ten thousand generations benefit.
translations.idiomatic: Now the lady serves the crown prince and is greatly loved but has no sons. Should she not use this time to early attach herself to the worthy and filial among the various sons, raise and establish one as proper heir and make him her son? While the husband lives, he will be heavily honored; after the husband dies at a hundred years, that son will become king, and she will never lose power. This is what is called the benefit of one word for ten thousand generations.

sentences.zh: 不以繁華時樹本，即色衰愛弛後，雖欲開一語，尚可得乎？

translations.literal: Not with flourishing time plant roots, when beauty decline love slacken after, though want open one word, still can get?
translations.idiomatic: If she does not plant roots in flourishing times, then after beauty declines and love slackens, though she wants to say one word, will she still be able to?

sentences.zh: 今子楚賢，而自知中男也，次不得為適，其母又不得幸，自附夫人，夫人誠以此時拔以為適，夫人則竟世有寵於秦矣。」

translations.literal: Now Zichu worthy, self know middle son, order not can become proper, his mother again not favored, self attach Furen, Furen truly with this time pull establish as proper, Furen then whole life have favor Qin.'
translations.idiomatic: Now Zichu is worthy and knows he is a middle son. By order he cannot become the proper heir; his mother is not favored. He attaches himself to the lady. If the lady truly pulls him up at this time to establish as proper heir, then the lady will have favor in Qin for her whole life.'

sentences.zh: 華陽夫人以為然，承太子閒，從容言子楚質於趙者絕賢，來往者皆稱譽之。

translations.literal: Huayang Furen think so, take crown prince leisure, composed speak Zichu hostage Zhao extremely worthy, come go all praise him.
translations.idiomatic: Lady Huayang thought this was right. She took advantage of the crown prince's leisure time and composedly spoke of how Zichu, the hostage in Zhao, was extremely worthy, with all who came and went praising him.

sentences.zh: 乃因涕泣曰：「妾幸得充後宮，不幸無子，願得子楚立以為適嗣，以託妾身。」

translations.literal: Then because weep say: 'Concubine fortunate get fill rear palace, unfortunate no sons, wish get Zichu establish as proper heir, to entrust concubine body.'
translations.idiomatic: She then wept and said: 'I was fortunate to fill the rear palace, but unfortunately have no sons. I wish to have Zichu established as proper heir to entrust my body to.'

sentences.zh: 安國君許之，乃與夫人刻玉符，約以為適嗣。

translations.literal: Anguo Jun permit it, then with Furen carve jade tally, covenant as proper heir.
translations.idiomatic: Lord Anguo permitted it and then, together with the lady, carved a jade tally, covenanting him as the proper heir.

sentences.zh: 安國君及夫人因厚餽遺子楚，而請呂不韋傅之，子楚以此名譽益盛於諸侯。

translations.literal: Anguo Jun and Furen because thick send Zichu, and ask Lü Buwei tutor him, Zichu with this fame reputation more flourish among lords.
translations.idiomatic: Lord Anguo and the lady then richly sent gifts to Zichu and asked Lü Buwei to tutor him. Zichu thereby became even more famous and renowned among the lords.

translations.literal: Lü Buwei thus with five hundred jin gold gave Zichu, for expenses, tie guests; Again with five hundred jin gold bought rare objects curios, personally carried west travel Qin, seek see Huayang Madame sister, all with objects presented Huayang Madame. Thus spoke Zichu worthy wise, ties feudal lord guests fill world, often said 'Zichu takes Madame as heaven, day night weep think crown prince and Madame.' Madame greatly pleased. Buwei thus made her sister persuade Madame saying: 'I heard, serve others with beauty, beauty declines love relaxes. Now Madame serves crown prince, much loved yet no sons, not with this time early self-attach to various sons' worthy filial ones, recommend establish as proper to son him, husband alive then heavy honored, husband hundred years after, sonned becomes king, end not lose power, this called one word ten thousand generations benefit. Not with flourishing time plant roots, then beauty declines love relaxes after, though wish open one word, still obtainable? Now Zichu worthy, self knows middle son, cannot become proper, mother again not favored, self-attaches Madame, Madame truly with this time pull establish as proper, Madame then compete lifetime favored in Qin.' Huayang Madame considered correct, seized crown prince leisure, leisurely spoke Zichu hostage in Zhao extremely worthy, passers all praise him. Thus because wept saying: 'Concubine fortunately fill rear palace, unfortunately no sons, wish Zichu establish as proper heir, to entrust concubine body.' Anguo Jun permitted, thus with Madame engraved jade tally, agreed as proper heir. Anguo Jun and Madame thus thick gifts sent Zichu, requested Lü Buwei tutor him, Zichu with this fame reputation increasingly flourishing among feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 呂不韋取邯鄲諸姬絕好善舞者與居，知有身。

translations.literal: Lü Buwei take Handan various beauties extremely good skilled dance with live, know have pregnancy.
translations.idiomatic: Lü Buwei took the most beautiful dancers from among Handan's various beauties to live with him, knowing she was pregnant.

sentences.zh: 子楚從不韋飲，見而說之，因起為壽，請之。

translations.literal: Zichu from Buwei drink, see and please her, because rise toast life, request her.
translations.idiomatic: Zichu was drinking with Buwei, saw her and was pleased with her. He rose to toast her life and requested her.

sentences.zh: 呂不韋怒，念業已破家為子楚，欲以釣奇，乃遂獻其姬。

translations.literal: Lü Buwei angry, think already broken family for Zichu, wish with hook strange, then give his beauty.
translations.idiomatic: Lü Buwei was angry. Thinking he had already broken his family for Zichu and wishing to hook something extraordinary, he then presented his beauty.

sentences.zh: 姬自匿有身，至大期時，生子政。

translations.literal: Beauty self hide have pregnancy, to great period time, give birth son Zheng.
translations.idiomatic: The beauty herself hid her pregnancy. When the great period came, she gave birth to a son named Zheng.

sentences.zh: 子楚遂立姬為夫人。

translations.literal: Zichu then establish beauty as Furen.
translations.idiomatic: Zichu then established the beauty as his lady.

translations.literal: Lü Buwei took Handan various beauties extremely good skilled dance with lived, knew had pregnancy. Zichu from Buwei drank, saw pleased, thus rose toast, requested her. Lü Buwei angered, thought already ruined family for Zichu, wished to fish rare, thus presented his beauty. Beauty self hid pregnancy, to great period time, bore son Zheng. Zichu thus established beauty as Madame.

sentences.zh: 秦昭王五十年，使王齮圍邯鄲，急，趙欲殺子楚。

translations.literal: Qin Zhao Wang fiftieth year, make Wang Ji surround Handan, urgent, Zhao want kill Zichu.
translations.idiomatic: In King Zhao of Qin's fiftieth year, he sent Wang Ji to surround Handan. It was urgent, and Zhao wanted to kill Zichu.

sentences.zh: 子楚與呂不韋謀，行金六百斤予守者吏，得脫，亡赴秦軍，遂以得歸。

translations.literal: Zichu with Lü Buwei plan, walk gold six hundred jin give guard officials, get escape, flee join Qin army, then with get return.
translations.idiomatic: Zichu plotted with Lü Buwei, gave six hundred jin of gold to the guarding officials, got to escape, fled to join the Qin army, and thus was able to return.

sentences.zh: 趙欲殺子楚妻子，子楚夫人趙豪家女也，得匿，以故母子竟得活。

translations.literal: Zhao want kill Zichu wife children, Zichu wife Zhao powerful family daughter, get hide, with reason mother child finally get live.
translations.idiomatic: Zhao wanted to kill Zichu's wife and children. Zichu's wife was the daughter of a powerful Zhao family and was able to hide them. For this reason, mother and child finally survived.

sentences.zh: 秦昭王五十六年，薨，太子安國君立為王，華陽夫人為王后，子楚為太子。

translations.literal: Qin Zhao Wang fifty sixth year, die, crown prince Anguo Jun establish king, Huayang Furen become queen, Zichu become crown prince.
translations.idiomatic: In King Zhao of Qin's fifty-sixth year, he died. Crown Prince Lord Anguo ascended as king, Lady Huayang became queen, and Zichu became crown prince.

sentences.zh: 趙亦奉子楚夫人及子政歸秦。

translations.literal: Zhao also send Zichu wife and son Zheng return Qin.
translations.idiomatic: Zhao also sent Zichu's wife and son Zheng back to Qin.

translations.literal: Qin King Zhao fiftieth year, sent Wang Ji besiege Handan, urgent, Zhao wished kill Zichu. Zichu with Lü Buwei planned, gave gold six hundred jin to guard officials, got escape, fled join Qin army, thus able return. Zhao wished kill Zichu wife children, Zichu Madame Zhao powerful family girl, got hide, thus mother child finally survived. Qin King Zhao fifty-sixth year, died, crown prince Anguo Jun established as king, Huayang Madame as queen, Zichu as crown prince. Zhao also sent Zichu Madame and Zi Zheng return Qin.

sentences.zh: 秦王立一年，薨，謚為孝文王。

translations.literal: Qin king establish one year, die, posthumous title Xiao Wen Wang.
translations.idiomatic: The Qin king reigned for one year and died. His posthumous title was King Xiaowen.

sentences.zh: 太子子楚代立，是為莊襄王。

translations.literal: Crown prince Zichu succeed establish, this Zhuang Xiang Wang.
translations.idiomatic: Crown Prince Zichu succeeded to the throne. This was King Zhuangxiang.

sentences.zh: 莊襄王所母華陽后為華陽太后，真母夏姬尊以為夏太后。

translations.literal: Zhuang Xiang Wang birth mother Huayang Hou become Huayang太后, true mother Xia Ji honored as Xia太后.
translations.idiomatic: King Zhuangxiang's birth mother, Queen Huayang, became Grand Dowager Huayang. His true mother, Xia Ji, was honored as Grand Dowager Xia.

sentences.zh: 莊襄王元年，以呂不韋為丞相，封為文信侯，食河南雒陽十萬戶。

translations.literal: Zhuang Xiang Wang first year, with Lü Buwei as prime minister, enfeoff as Wen Xin Hou, eat Henan Luoyang ten thousand households.
translations.idiomatic: In King Zhuangxiang's first year, he made Lü Buwei prime minister, enfeoffed him as Marquis Wenxin, and granted him ten thousand households in Henan Luoyang.

translations.literal: Qin king established one year, died, posthumous title Xiaowen Wang. Crown prince Zichu succeeded, this Zhuangxiang Wang. Zhuangxiang Wang birth mother Huayang Queen as Huayang Empress Dowager, true mother Xia Ji honored as Xia Empress Dowager. Zhuangxiang Wang first year, appointed Lü Buwei as chancellor, enfeoffed as Wenxin Marquis, ate Luoyang ten thousand households.

sentences.zh: 莊襄王即位三年，薨，太子政立為王，尊呂不韋為相國，號稱「仲父」。

translations.literal: Zhuang Xiang Wang take throne three years, die, crown prince Zheng establish king, honor Lü Buwei as prime minister, titled 'Zhong Fu'.
translations.idiomatic: King Zhuangxiang reigned for three years and died. Crown Prince Zheng ascended as king and honored Lü Buwei as prime minister, calling him 'Zhong Fu' (Second Father).

sentences.zh: 秦王年少，太后時時竊私通呂不韋。

translations.literal: Qin king young,太后 from time to time secretly illicitly connect Lü Buwei.
translations.idiomatic: The Qin king was young, and the dowager often secretly had illicit relations with Lü Buwei.

sentences.zh: 不韋家僮萬人。

translations.literal: Buwei family retainers ten thousand people.
translations.idiomatic: Lü Buwei had ten thousand retainers in his household.

translations.literal: Zhuangxiang Wang ascended third year, died, crown prince Zheng established as king, honored Lü Buwei as prime minister, titled 'Zhong Fu'. Qin king young, Empress Dowager often secretly communicated Lü Buwei. Buwei household retainers ten thousand persons.

sentences.zh: 當是時，魏有信陵君，楚有春申君，趙有平原君，齊有孟嘗君，皆下士喜賓客以相傾。

translations.literal: At this time, Wei have Xinling Jun, Chu have Chunshen Jun, Zhao have Pingyuan Jun, Qi have Mengchang Jun, all lower themselves delight guests to mutually contend.
translations.idiomatic: At this time, Wei had Lord Xinling, Chu had Lord Chunshen, Zhao had Lord Pingyuan, and Qi had Lord Mengchang. They all humbled themselves and delighted in guests to contend with each other.

sentences.zh: 呂不韋以秦之彊，羞不如，亦招致士，厚遇之，至食客三千人。

translations.literal: Lü Buwei with Qin strength, ashamed not equal, also recruit retain scholars, thick treat them, to guest three thousand people.
translations.idiomatic: Lü Buwei, seeing Qin's strength, was ashamed not to equal them. He also recruited scholars, treated them generously, and came to have three thousand guests.

sentences.zh: 是時諸侯多辯士，如荀卿之徒，著書布天下。

translations.literal: At this time lords many debaters, like Xun Qing and others, write books spread world.
translations.idiomatic: At this time the lords had many debaters, like Xun Qing and others, who wrote books and spread them throughout the world.

sentences.zh: 呂不韋乃使其客人人著所聞，集論以為八覽、六論、十二紀，二十餘萬言。

translations.literal: Lü Buwei then make his guests each write what heard, collect discuss to make eight views, six discussions, twelve records, twenty plus ten thousand words.
translations.idiomatic: Lü Buwei then had his guests each write what they had heard. He collected their discussions to make the Eight Views, Six Discussions, and Twelve Records - over two hundred thousand words.

sentences.zh: 以為備天地萬物古今之事，號曰呂氏春秋。

translations.literal: Think prepare heaven earth myriad things ancient modern matters, titled Lü Shi Chun Qiu.
translations.idiomatic: He considered it a complete account of heaven, earth, the myriad things, and ancient and modern matters. It was titled the Lü Shi Chun Qiu (Spring and Autumn Annals of Mr. Lü).

sentences.zh: 布咸陽市門，懸千金其上，延諸侯游士賓客有能增損一字者予千金。

translations.literal: Spread Xianyang market gate, hang thousand gold above, invite lords wandering scholars guests have able add subtract one word give thousand gold.
translations.idiomatic: He displayed it at the Xianyang market gate and hung a thousand pieces of gold above it. He invited lords, wandering scholars, and guests, saying anyone who could add or subtract a single word would receive a thousand pieces of gold.

translations.literal: At this time, Wei had Xinyang Jun, Chu had Chunshen Jun, Zhao had Pingyuan Jun, Qi had Mengchang Jun, all recruited scholars delighted guests to mutually contend. Lü Buwei with Qin's strength, ashamed not equal, also recruited scholars, thick treated them, to guests three thousand persons. At this time feudal lords many debaters, like Xun Qing and others, wrote books spread world. Lü Buwei thus made his guests each write what heard, collected theories as eight views, six discussions, twelve records, twenty plus ten thousand words. Considered complete heaven earth myriad things ancient modern affairs, titled 'Lü Shi Chun Qiu'. Spread Xianyang market gate, hung thousand jin above, invited feudal lords wandering scholars guests able increase decrease one word give thousand jin.

sentences.zh: 始皇帝益壯，太后淫不止。

translations.literal: First Emperor more strong,太后 lewd not stop.
translations.idiomatic: The First Emperor grew stronger, but the dowager's licentiousness did not stop.

sentences.zh: 呂不韋恐覺禍及己，乃私求大陰人嫪毐以為舍人，時縱倡樂，使毐以其陰關桐輪而行，令太后聞之，以啗太后。

translations.literal: Lü Buwei fear aware calamity reach self, then secretly seek large penis man Lao Ai as household retainer, from time to time let loose singers musicians, make Lao Ai with his penis close paulownia wheel walk, make太后 hear, to tempt太后.
translations.idiomatic: Lü Buwei feared that discovery would bring calamity upon himself. He secretly sought a man with a large penis, Lao Ai, to be his retainer. From time to time he let loose singers and musicians, making Lao Ai walk with his penis close to a paulownia wheel so the dowager would hear of it and be tempted.

sentences.zh: 太后聞，果欲私得之。

translations.literal: 太后 hear, indeed want privately get him.
translations.idiomatic: The dowager heard of it and indeed wanted to obtain him privately.

sentences.zh: 呂不韋乃進嫪毐，詐令人以腐罪告之。

translations.literal: Lü Buwei then advance Lao Ai, falsely make people with castration crime accuse him.
translations.idiomatic: Lü Buwei then presented Lao Ai and falsely had people accuse him of the crime of castration.

sentences.zh: 不韋又陰謂太后曰：「可事詐腐，則得給事中。」

translations.literal: Buwei again secretly tell太后 said: 'Can use castration fraud, then can serve inner palace.'
translations.idiomatic: Buwei again secretly told the dowager: 'If he can feign castration, then he can serve in the inner palace.'

sentences.zh: 太后乃陰厚賜主腐者吏，詐論之，拔其須眉為宦者，遂得侍太后。

translations.literal: 太后 then secretly thick reward chief castration officials, falsely judge him, pluck his beard eyebrows make eunuch, then get serve太后.
translations.idiomatic: The dowager then secretly richly rewarded the chief castrator officials. They falsely judged him, plucked his beard and eyebrows to make him a eunuch, and thus he was able to serve the dowager.

sentences.zh: 太后私與通，絕愛之。

translations.literal: 太后 privately with connect, extremely love him.
translations.idiomatic: The dowager privately had relations with him and loved him extremely.

sentences.zh: 有身，太后恐人知之，詐卜當避時，徙宮居雍。

translations.literal: Have pregnancy,太后 fear people know, falsely divine should avoid time, move palace live Yong.
translations.idiomatic: She became pregnant. The dowager feared people would know, so she falsely divined that she should avoid the time and moved her palace to live in Yong.

sentences.zh: 嫪毐常從，賞賜甚厚，事皆決於嫪毐。

translations.literal: Lao Ai constantly follow, rewards gifts very thick, matters all decide by Lao Ai.
translations.idiomatic: Lao Ai constantly followed her. Rewards and gifts were very generous. All matters were decided by Lao Ai.

sentences.zh: 嫪毐家僮數千人，諸客求宦為嫪毐舍人千餘人。

translations.literal: Lao Ai household retainers several thousand, various guests seek office as Lao Ai household retainers thousand plus people.
translations.idiomatic: Lao Ai had several thousand household retainers. Various guests sought office to become Lao Ai's retainers - over a thousand people.

translations.literal: First Emperor increasingly mature, Empress Dowager licentious not stop. Lü Buwei feared calamity reach self, thus secretly sought great endowment man Lao Ai as retainer, timely released singers music, made Ai with his endowment pass paulownia wheel to travel, commanded Empress Dowager hear, to tempt Empress Dowager. Empress Dowager heard, truly wished privately obtain him. Lü Buwei thus advanced Lao Ai, falsely had person with rotten crime accuse him. Buwei again secretly told Empress Dowager: 'Can make falsely rotten crime, then obtain serve inner palace.' Empress Dowager thus secretly thick rewarded main rotten officials, falsely judged him, pulled his beard eyebrows as eunuch, thus obtained serve Empress Dowager. Empress Dowager privately communicated, extremely favored him. Had pregnancy, Empress Dowager feared people know, falsely divined should avoid time, moved palace dwell Yong. Lao Ai constantly followed, rewards very thick, affairs all decided by Lao Ai. Lao Ai household retainers several thousand, various guests sought office as Lao Ai retainers thousand plus persons.

sentences.zh: 始皇七年，莊襄王母夏太后薨。

translations.literal: First Emperor seventh year, Zhuang Xiang Wang mother Xia太后 die.
translations.idiomatic: In the First Emperor's seventh year, King Zhuangxiang's mother, Grand Dowager Xia, died.

sentences.zh: 孝文王后曰華陽太后，與孝文王會葬壽陵。

translations.literal: Xiao Wen Wang queen said Huayang太后, with Xiao Wen Wang together bury Shou Ling.
translations.idiomatic: King Xiaowen's queen, called Grand Dowager Huayang, was buried together with King Xiaowen at Shouling.

sentences.zh: 夏太后子莊襄王葬芷陽，故夏太后獨別葬杜東，曰「東望吾子，西望吾夫。

translations.literal: Xia太后 son Zhuang Xiang Wang bury Zhi Yang, therefore Xia太后 alone separate bury Du East, said 'East look my son, West look my husband.
translations.idiomatic: Grand Dowager Xia's son, King Zhuangxiang, was buried at Zhiyang. Therefore Grand Dowager Xia was buried separately to the east of Du, saying: 'To the east I look toward my son, to the west toward my husband.

sentences.zh: 後百年，旁當有萬家邑」。

translations.literal: Later hundred years, side should have ten thousand households city.'
translations.idiomatic: After a hundred years, nearby there should be a city of ten thousand households.'

translations.literal: First Emperor seventh year, Zhuangxiang Wang mother Xia Empress Dowager died. Xiaowen Wang queen called Huayang Empress Dowager, with Xiaowen Wang met buried Shou Mausoleum. Xia Empress Dowager son Zhuangxiang Wang buried Zhi Yang, thus Xia Empress Dowager alone separately buried Du east, said 'East look my son, west look my husband. After hundred years, beside should have ten thousand household city.'

sentences.zh: 始皇九年，有告嫪毐實非宦者，常與太后私亂，生子二人，皆匿之。

translations.literal: First Emperor ninth year, have accuse Lao Ai actually not eunuch, often with太后 private lewd, give birth two sons, all hide them.
translations.idiomatic: In the First Emperor's ninth year, there was an accusation that Lao Ai was actually not a eunuch. He often had illicit relations with the dowager and fathered two sons, all of whom were hidden.

sentences.zh: 與太后謀曰「王即薨，以子為後」。

translations.literal: With太后 plot said 'King if die, establish son as heir'.
translations.idiomatic: He plotted with the dowager, saying: 'If the king dies, establish my son as heir.'

sentences.zh: 於是秦王下吏治，具得情實，事連相國呂不韋。

translations.literal: Then Qin king send officials investigate, fully get true situation, matter connect prime minister Lü Buwei.
translations.idiomatic: Then the Qin king sent officials to investigate. They fully obtained the true situation. The matter implicated Prime Minister Lü Buwei.

sentences.zh: 九月，夷嫪毐三族，殺太后所生兩子，而遂遷太后於雍。

translations.literal: Ninth month, exterminate Lao Ai three clans, kill太后 born two sons, then move太后 to Yong.
translations.idiomatic: In the ninth month, they exterminated Lao Ai's three clans, killed the two sons born to the dowager, and then moved the dowager to Yong.

sentences.zh: 諸嫪毐舍人皆沒其家而遷之蜀。

translations.literal: Various Lao Ai retainers all confiscate their families and move to Shu.
translations.idiomatic: All of Lao Ai's retainers had their families confiscated and were moved to Shu.

sentences.zh: 王欲誅相國，為其奉先王功大，及賓客辯士為游說者眾，王不忍致法。

translations.literal: King want execute prime minister, because his serve previous king merit great, and guests debaters for him lobby many, king not bear apply law.
translations.idiomatic: The king wanted to execute the prime minister, but because his service to the previous king was meritorious, and there were many guests and debaters lobbying for him, the king could not bear to apply the law.

translations.literal: First Emperor ninth year, had accusation Lao Ai truly not eunuch, constantly with Empress Dowager privately chaotic, bore sons two persons, all hid them. With Empress Dowager planned said 'King if dies, with son as successor'. Thus Qin king sent officials investigate, fully obtained real situation, affair connected prime minister Lü Buwei. Ninth month, exterminated Lao Ai three clans, killed Empress Dowager born two sons, then moved Empress Dowager to Yong. Various Lao Ai retainers all confiscated households moved to Shu. King wished execute prime minister, for his serve previous king merit great, and guests debaters for wandering persuasion many, king not bear apply law.

sentences.zh: 秦王十年十月，免相國呂不韋。

translations.literal: Qin king tenth year tenth month, dismiss prime minister Lü Buwei.
translations.idiomatic: In the Qin king's tenth year, tenth month, he dismissed Prime Minister Lü Buwei.

sentences.zh: 及齊人茅焦說秦王，秦王乃迎太后於雍，歸復咸陽，而出文信侯就國河南。

translations.literal: When Qi person Mao Jiao persuade Qin king, Qin king then welcome太后 from Yong, return restore Xianyang, and send Wen Xin Hou go to his state Henan.
translations.idiomatic: When the Qi man Mao Jiao persuaded the Qin king, the Qin king then welcomed the dowager from Yong, returned her to Xianyang, and sent Marquis Wenxin to his state in Henan.

translations.literal: Qin king tenth year tenth month, dismissed prime minister Lü Buwei. When Qi person Mao Jiao persuaded Qin king, Qin king then welcomed Empress Dowager at Yong, returned restored Xianyang, yet sent Wenxin Marquis go to fief Henan.

sentences.zh: 歲餘，諸侯賓客使者相望於道，請文信侯。

translations.literal: Year plus, various lords guests envoys each other see on road, visit Wen Xin Hou.
translations.idiomatic: After more than a year, lords' guests and envoys could be seen one after another on the roads, visiting Marquis Wenxin.

sentences.zh: 秦王恐其為變，乃賜文信侯書曰：「君何功於秦？

translations.literal: Qin king fear he cause change, then grant Wen Xin Hou letter said: 'You what merit to Qin?
translations.idiomatic: The Qin king feared he would cause unrest. He granted Marquis Wenxin a letter saying: 'What merit do you have for Qin?'

sentences.zh: 秦封君河南，食十萬戶。

translations.literal: Qin enfeoff you Henan, eat ten thousand households.
translations.idiomatic: Qin enfeoffed you in Henan, with ten thousand households.

sentences.zh: 君何親於秦？

translations.literal: You what close to Qin?
translations.idiomatic: What closeness do you have to Qin?

sentences.zh: 號稱仲父。

translations.literal: Called Zhong Fu.
translations.idiomatic: You are called Zhong Fu.

sentences.zh: 其與家屬徙處蜀！」

translations.literal: Take your family move live Shu!'
translations.idiomatic: Take your family and move to live in Shu!'

sentences.zh: 呂不韋自度稍侵，恐誅，乃飲酖而死。

translations.literal: Lü Buwei self measure gradually encroach, fear execute, then drink poison die.
translations.idiomatic: Lü Buwei measured himself as gradually encroaching. Fearing execution, he drank poison and died.

sentences.zh: 秦王所加怒呂不韋、嫪毐皆已死，乃皆復歸嫪毐舍人遷蜀者。

translations.literal: Qin king what add anger Lü Buwei, Lao Ai all already dead, then all restore return Lao Ai retainers moved Shu ones.
translations.idiomatic: Those whom the Qin king had been angry at - Lü Buwei and Lao Ai - had all died. He then restored and returned all of Lao Ai's retainers who had been moved to Shu.

translations.literal: Year plus, various feudal lord guests envoys mutually looked on road, requested Wenxin Marquis. Qin king feared his change, thus granted Wenxin Marquis letter said: 'Lord what merit to Qin? Qin enfeoffed lord Henan, ate ten thousand households. Lord what close to Qin? Titled Zhong Fu. Him with family move dwell Shu!' Lü Buwei self-measured gradually encroached, feared execution, thus drank poison died. Qin king added anger Lü Buwei, Lao Ai all already dead, thus all restored Lao Ai retainers moved Shu ones.

sentences.zh: 始皇十九年，太后薨，謚為帝太后，與莊襄王會葬茝陽。

translations.literal: First Emperor nineteenth year,太后 die, posthumous title Emperor太后, with Zhuang Xiang Wang together bury Zhi Yang.
translations.idiomatic: In the First Emperor's nineteenth year, the dowager died. Her posthumous title was Empress Dowager. She was buried together with King Zhuangxiang at Zhiyang.

translations.literal: First Emperor nineteenth year, Empress Dowager died, posthumous title Di Empress Dowager, with Zhuangxiang Wang met buried Zhi Yang.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：不韋及嫪毐貴，封號文信侯。

translations.literal: Grand Historian said: Lü Buwei and Lao Ai noble, enfeoff titled Wen Xin Hou.
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian said: Lü Buwei and Lao Ai were noble, enfeoffed and titled Marquis Wenxin.

sentences.zh: 人之告嫪毐，毐聞之。

translations.literal: Person accuse Lao Ai, Lao Ai hear it.
translations.idiomatic: Someone accused Lao Ai. Lao Ai heard of it.

sentences.zh: 秦王驗左右，未發。

translations.literal: Qin king verify attendants, not yet issue.
translations.idiomatic: The Qin king verified with his attendants. It had not yet been issued.

sentences.zh: 上之雍郊，毐恐禍起，乃與黨謀，矯太后璽發卒以反蘄年宮。

translations.literal: Go to Yong suburb, Lao Ai fear calamity arise, then with party plot, forge太后 seal send troops to rebel at Qi Nian palace.
translations.idiomatic: He went to the Yong suburb. Lao Ai feared calamity would arise. He then plotted with his party, forged the dowager's seal, and sent troops to rebel at the Qi Nian palace.

sentences.zh: 發吏攻毐，毐敗亡走，追斬之好畤，遂滅其宗。

translations.literal: Send officials attack Lao Ai, Lao Ai defeat flee run, pursue kill at Hao Zhi, then exterminate his clan.
translations.idiomatic: He sent officials to attack Lao Ai. Lao Ai was defeated and fled. They pursued and killed him at Haozhi, then exterminated his clan.

sentences.zh: 而呂不韋由此絀矣。

translations.literal: And Lü Buwei from this dismissed.
translations.idiomatic: And Lü Buwei was dismissed because of this.

sentences.zh: 孔子之所謂「聞」者，其呂子乎？

translations.literal: Confucius what called 'heard' ones, perhaps Lü Zi?
translations.idiomatic: Those whom Confucius called 'heard of' - was it perhaps Master Lü?

translations.literal: Grand Historian says: Buwei and Lao Ai noble, enfeoffed titled Wenxin Marquis. Person accused Lao Ai, Ai heard. Qin king examined attendants, not issued. Went to Yong suburbs, Ai feared calamity rise, thus with party planned, forged Empress Dowager seal sent troops to rebel Qinian Palace. Sent officials attacked Ai, Ai defeated fled, pursued beheaded Haozhi, thus extinguished his clan. Lü Buwei from this demoted. Confucius's so-called 'heard' ones, perhaps Lü Zi?
